@description.name: @description
@description.body: Wrapper object for a method containing unit test code.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: There are two ways to define a test function. First by passing a class and a method name to the constructor or second by giving a the method directly.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: testCase {qx.dev.unit.TestCase?null} The test class, which contains the test method
@param.description: The test class, which contains the test method

@param.name: @param
@param.body: methodName {String?null} The name of the method

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
testFunction {Function?null} A reference to a test function. If this
    parameter is set the other parameters are ignored.
@param.description:
A reference to a test function. If this
    parameter is set the other parameters are ignored.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The test function

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Name of the test

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Name of the class containing the test

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The test class

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Runs the test and logs the test result to a {@link TestResult} instance,

@param.name: @param
@param.body: testResult {qx.dev.unit.TestResult} The class used to log the test result.
@param.description: The class used to log the test result.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Call the test class' setUp method.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Call the test class' tearDown method.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the full name of the test.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
